title: "Automation may be the future for financial centres"
excerpt: "Major challenges lie ahead for businesses. Amongst them are the upcoming reforms to accounting regulations, which include the shift to electronic invoicing. The process began with the issue of European Directive 2014/55/EU on electronic invoicing in public procurement."
